thread.title: Paris Sues Airbnb Over Rental Listings

author: Sam Schechner
title: Paris Sues Airbnb Over Rental Listings
text:
PARIS—The city of Paris is suing Airbnb Inc. to remove tens of thousands of unregistered listings in the French capital, heralding what could be a costly showdown in one of the company’s largest markets.
Paris demanded Thursday that a French court force Airbnb—and other smaller platforms—to remove listings that don’t comply with a new law that requires Parisians renting out their primary residences on sites like Airbnb to display a city registration number in their listings.
